abstract.text: The symbolic representation of stylistic font attributes.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: symbolically describes stylistic aspects of a font. The upper 16 bits are used to describe appearance of the font, whereas the lower 16 bits are for typeface information. The font appearance information represented by the upper 16 bits can be used for stylistic font matching.

abstract.text: Create text layouts, optimize font handling, and access font metrics and glyph data.
